data.title: Richard Attenborough and wife in care home for retired actors
data.meta_description: Richard Attenborough has moved into a care home with his wife, Sheila Sim, the actor and director’s son has said.  Michael Attenborough confirmed that his father, 89, moved into a residential home
data.text:
Richard Attenborough has moved into a care home with his wife, Sheila Sim, the actor and director’s son has said.

Michael Attenborough confirmed that his father, 89, moved into a residential home for elderly actors more than a year ago before he sold his home in Richmond, south-west London, for a reported £11.5 million. Michael, 63, who is stepping down as artistic director of the Almeida theatre in north London, said that his mother and father were living together in the home in west London.

“The family home has been sold and he has been at a care home with his wife since then,” he said.
